game.name: Arma Reforger
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Captions available, Steam Cloud
game.shortDescription: 대규모 복합 전투에 참여하고, 실시간 미션을 만들고 진행하고, 끝없는 커뮤니티 모드로 나만의 경험을 만들어 가세요. 냉전 시대로 투입되어 가장 사실적이고 몰입도 높은 군사 샌드박스를 경험해 보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Engage in massive combined arms battles, create and curate combat missions in real time, and shape your experience with endless community mods. Deploy into the Cold War and experience the most authentic and immersive military sandbox ever created.

reviewHighlights.text: Sadly, I can't recommend. I really, really wanted to like Reforger but the performance is awful, even worst than in Arma 3. The brand new game engine...
Basically an Arma 4 paid beta with people beta testing in 1080p at low settings on a 5080. Absolute travesty for an operation flashpoint veteran. This...
